export class ExportUtils{async copyResults(originalText,changedText,aiResults){let textToCopy="QUICKDIFF COMPARISON RESULTS ".concat('='.repeat(50)," ");textToCopy+="Original Text: ".concat('-'.repeat(20)," ").concat(originalText," ");textToCopy+="Changed Text: ".concat('-'.repeat(20)," ").concat(changedText," ");if(aiResults&&aiResults.length>0){textToCopy+="AI ANALYSIS RESULTS ".concat('='.repeat(50)," ");aiResults.forEach(result=>{textToCopy+="".concat(result.title," ").concat('-'.repeat(result.title.length)," ");textToCopy+=this.stripHtml(result.content)+' ';});}try{await navigator.clipboard.writeText(textToCopy);return Promise.resolve();}catch(error){// Fallback for older browsers const textArea=document.createElement('textarea');textArea.value=textToCopy;document.body.appendChild(textArea);textArea.select();document.execCommand('copy');document.body.removeChild(textArea);return Promise.resolve();}}exportToTxt(originalText,changedText,diffResult,aiResults){let content="QUICKDIFF COMPARISON RESULTS ".concat('='.repeat(50)," ");content+="Generated on: ".concat(new Date().toLocaleString()," ");content+="Original Text: ".concat('-'.repeat(20)," ").concat(originalText," ");content+="Changed Text: ".concat('-'.repeat(20)," ").concat(changedText," ");// Add comparison summary if(diffResult&&diffResult.stats){const stats=diffResult.stats;content+="COMPARISON SUMMARY ".concat('-'.repeat(20)," ");content+="Added: ".concat(stats.linesAdded||stats.wordsAdded||stats.charactersAdded||0," ");content+="Removed: ".concat(stats.linesRemoved||stats.wordsRemoved||stats.charactersRemoved||0," ");content+="Modified: ".concat(stats.linesModified||0," ");}if(aiResults&&aiResults.length>0){content+="AI ANALYSIS RESULTS ".concat('='.repeat(50)," ");aiResults.forEach(result=>{content+="".concat(result.title," ").concat('-'.repeat(result.title.length)," ");content+=this.stripHtml(result.content)+' ';});}this.downloadFile(content,'quickdiff-comparison.txt','text/plain');}exportToHtml(originalText,changedText,diffResult,aiResults){const aiResultsHtml=aiResults&&aiResults.length>0?aiResults.map(result=>"
".concat(result.title,"
").concat(result.content,"
")).join(''):'';const htmlContent=" QuickDiff - Text Comparison Results

");this.downloadFile(htmlContent,'quickdiff-comparison.html','text/html');}exportToMarkdown(originalText,changedText,diffResult,aiResults){let mdContent="# ⚡ QuickDiff - Text Comparison Results *Generated on: ".concat(new Date().toLocaleString(),"* --- ## 📄 Original Text ``` ").concat(originalText," ``` ## 📝 Changed Text ``` ").concat(changedText," ``` ## 📊 Comparison Summary ");if(diffResult&&diffResult.stats){const stats=diffResult.stats;mdContent+="| Metric | Count | |--------|-------| | Added | ".concat(stats.linesAdded||stats.wordsAdded||stats.charactersAdded||0," | | Removed | ").concat(stats.linesRemoved||stats.wordsRemoved||stats.charactersRemoved||0," | | Modified | ").concat(stats.linesModified||0," | ");}if(aiResults&&aiResults.length>0){mdContent+="--- ## 🧠 AI Analysis Results ";aiResults.forEach(result=>{mdContent+="### ".concat(result.title," ").concat(this.stripHtml(result.content)," ");});}mdContent+=" --- *Generated by QuickDiff React - Advanced Text Comparison Tool*";this.downloadFile(mdContent,'quickdiff-comparison.md','text/markdown');}exportToPdf(originalText,changedText,diffResult,aiResults){// Check if jsPDF is available if(typeof window.jspdf==='undefined'&&typeof window.jsPDF==='undefined'){console.log('jsPDF not available, using fallback method');this.exportToPdfFallback(originalText,changedText,diffResult,aiResults);return;}const{jsPDF}=window.jspdf||window;const doc=new jsPDF();let yPosition=20;const pageWidth=doc.internal.pageSize.getWidth();const pageHeight=doc.internal.pageSize.getHeight();const margin=20;const contentWidth=pageWidth-margin*2;// Helper function to add new page if needed const checkPageBreak=function(){let requiredSpace=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:20;if(yPosition+requiredSpace>pageHeight-margin){doc.addPage();yPosition=margin;return true;}return false;};// Title doc.setFontSize(16);doc.setFont('helvetica','bold');doc.text('QuickDiff React - Text Comparison Results',margin,yPosition);yPosition+=12;// Timestamp doc.setFontSize(10);doc.setFont('helvetica','normal');doc.text("Generated on: ".concat(new Date().toLocaleString()),margin,yPosition);yPosition+=15;// Add separator line doc.setLineWidth(0.5);doc.line(margin,yPosition,pageWidth-margin,yPosition);yPosition+=15;// Original Text Section checkPageBreak(30);doc.setFontSize(12);doc.setFont('helvetica','bold');doc.text('Original Text:',margin,yPosition);yPosition+=8;doc.setFontSize(9);doc.setFont('courier','normal');const originalLines=doc.splitTextToSize(originalText||'No content provided',contentWidth);for(let i=0;i0){checkPageBreak(30);doc.setFontSize(12);doc.setFont('helvetica','bold');doc.text('AI Analysis Results:',margin,yPosition);yPosition+=10;aiResults.forEach(result=>{checkPageBreak(20);doc.setFontSize(11);doc.setFont('helvetica','bold');doc.text(result.title,margin,yPosition);yPosition+=8;doc.setFontSize(9);doc.setFont('helvetica','normal');const cleanContent=this.stripHtml(result.content);const contentLines=doc.splitTextToSize(cleanContent,contentWidth);for(let i=0;i0?aiResults.map(result=>"
".concat(result.title,"
").concat(this.stripHtml(result.content),"
")).join(''):'';const printWindow=window.open('','_blank');const printContent=" QuickDiff React - Text Comparison Results

");printWindow.document.write(printContent);printWindow.document.close();setTimeout(()=>{printWindow.print();},500);}downloadFile(content,filename,mimeType){const blob=new Blob([content],{type:mimeType});const url=URL.createObjectURL(blob);const a=document.createElement('a');a.href=url;a.download=filename;document.body.appendChild(a);a.click();document.body.removeChild(a);URL.revokeObjectURL(url);}escapeHtml(text){const div=document.createElement('div');div.textContent=text;return div.innerHTML;}stripHtml(html){const div=document.createElement('div');div.innerHTML=html;return div.textContent||div.innerText||'';}}
